name: Mr. Mittens Cupcakeria
description:
In the very early stages of development, Mr Mittens’ Cupcakeria will be a fnaf-like horror game with several unique mechanics to manage if you wish for your poor ol’ security guard to keep all their limbs. At the moment, it has a long way to go before we are ready for the full release but we hope you’ll stick around and support us as we make our dream a reality.

Discord: https://discord.gg/ETHvvSdy
